summary: As WWII comes to an end, a group of Buchenwald's emaciated prisoners risk their lives for the safety of the camp's youngest inmate: a four-year-old Auschwitz-born Jewish prisoner. Is there a future for the Buchenwald boy?
cast: Florian Stetter|Peter Schneider|Sylvester Groth|Sabin Tambrea|Robert Gallinowski|Rainer Bock|Rafael Stachowiak|Thorsten Merten|Torsten Michaelis|Robert Mika|Matthias Bundschuh|Ulrich Brandhoff|Torsten Ranft|Andreas Lust|Marko Mandic|Jan Bavala|Leonard Carow|Janusz Cichocki|Paula Hartmann|Jens Harzer|Max Hegewald|Robert Hunger-BÃ¼hler|Jan Kubka|David Sir|Vojta Vomacka|Tim Williams
title: Desnudo entre lobos
